page.title: 19MEDIA IN AYLESBURY
page.content: All the national, daily, and Sunday newspapers are available in Aylesbury as are the national magazines and periodicals. There are 4 weekly {local papers}, 3 of which are free. There are the Aylesbury Plus (available on a Wednesday) , Bucks Advertiser (delivered on a Friday) and the Wendover and Aylesbury Times (out on a Saturday). {Bucks Herald} is the main local paper. It costs 12p and is printed in Aylesbury on a Wednesday morning. All these local papers rely on advertisements to cover their costs. Aylesbury has no local {television} or {radio} station but it does receive the national stations plus Chiltern radio from Luton, BBC Radio Bedford and Central television from Birmingham.
